import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { slugify } from '../../utils'; const PostOne = ( { data, classes, bgWhite } ) => { return (
{data.categories.slice(0, 1)}
{data.title}
  • { data.date }

) } export default PostOne;
